A {{named req|TransformationTrait}} is a class template that provides a transformation of its template type parameter.

===Requirements===
* Takes one template type parameter (additional template parameters are optional and allowed).
* The transformed type is a publicly accessible nested type named {{c|type}}.

===Standard library===
All [[cpp/meta#Type transformations|type transformation traits]] satisfy {{named req|TransformationTrait}}.

The following standard library class templates also satisfy {{named req|TransformationTrait}}.
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/utility/tuple/dsc tuple_element}}

{{dsc end}}
